mapper.sql: select r.* from t_role r where r.isActive = 1 ORDER BY roleid asc
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_role where isActive = 1 and rolename = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_role_right (roleid, rightid) VALUES((select r.roleid from t_role r where r.rolename = #{rolename} limit 0,1),1)
mapper.update: update t_role set isActive = #{isActive,jdbcType=DECIMAL},modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where roleid = #{roleid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select r.* from t_right r where r.rightid <> 1 ORDER BY r.parentid asc,r.orderby
SELECT g.rightid FROM t_role r, t_role_right g WHERE r.roleid = #{roleid} AND g.roleid = r.roleid
SELECT count(1) FROM t_user u, ( SELECT ur.userid FROM t_role r, t_user_role ur WHERE r.roleid = #{roleid} AND r.roleid = ur.roleid ) ur WHERE u.userid = ur.userid AND u.isActive = 1
